results.content: I understand that this is an intermediate class, but we just hopped right into running commands we are not yet familiar with and working with software we may have not used before. It would help greatly if there was a starter video that explains these things as well as how to install dependencies.

response.content: Hi Zac, the course was designed to be all hands on, I explain the commands, why and how we are using it as we use the commands, I notice that many people like a slide presentation and I started to add a few of those in the course as optional content (few more just coming up) this way more advanced students can fallow the coding and more beginners students can also watch the explanations. Also I'm always around, few free to ask as many questions as you want, I normally answer in hours (depending on the time zone your are event straight away). Dependancies are part of the appendix lectures on the end of the course, there is one for Mac and another one for Windows users).  If you still few that the course is not a good match for you, please fell free to return it for a full refund.

results.content: Excellent course, there are so much information that I decide to do a first pass in 2x, now I doing it again coding along with the instructor. His speed and explanation is just on the right speed to code along, and the explanations are very clear so I don't have to keep stopping or rewind the videos. My favourite part is the Dockerized applications, I'll never install a database again in my machine now. Took me a long time to decide in one course and when I see this one, as the instructor said, was a no brainer. Thank you Icaro

results.content: You did it again, thank you. I trusted Icaro to teach Swift many years ago, he helped a lot in my journey, I can see he was both an inspiration and a mentor. Today I’m a senior developer and I make a much better living than I use to do and I have Icaro to thank you for must of it. I’m trusting him now again learning Deno and I’m sure it will pay off (again) also I learned a lot in Docker and React. This course has everything!!!

results.content: Conhecimentos que vão me agregar muito.

Course is really nice.
If you are interested in the field then you should definitely consider it.
When it comes to Icaro then I had taken many other courses from him like I learned iOS development from him and other things related to backed as well.
The number one reason to go for the course is instructor itself.
The best part is things are to the point and it don't waste your time. People do add unnecessary crap to make the videos longer but here it's clean and to the point. No crap and only the thing you want.
Thank Icaro for putting the efforts.
